title: IThreadFeatureData.GetEndConditionReference
description: Gets the Up To Selection end condition reference of this thread feature.
returns: Vertex , edge , plane , or planar surface
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IThreadFeatureData::EndCondition
is set to
swEndConditions_e
.swEndCondUpToSelection
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
